What we do

Marybeth’s Cottage offers patients and caregivers a place of solace — away from the beeping machines and the noisy commotion of the hospital, to recharge. Our guests will find a home-cooked meal, a quiet place to sleep, and people who understand.

Know more

Testimonials

Get to know some of the Families

“We came to Florida expecting to be at the hospital for a matter of days, and three weeks later we still had not left. Mary Beths Cottage made this unforseeable challenge much smoother for Abbie and myself.”

Philip Wiltmore - Single Dad, Nebraska

“Flying back and forth to Florida was a stressful and sometimes lonely journey, but it helped knowing I always had a helping hand waiting for me once I arrived. ”

Amy Thompson - Student, Texas

We have always stuck together, and Mary Beths Cottage has allowed us to stay even closer when times are rough.

Sherley Hopson & Friends - Northern Florida

One day we found ourselves in a world that we had never known once our son Zachary became sick. But the support staff and the hospitality gave us one less thing to think about.

Tom & Sue Davidson - Parents, N. Carolina
